thread.section_title: Hotel Scalinata di Spagna - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location!
thread.title_full: Great location! - Review of Hotel Scalinata di Spagna, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: pgrund_628425
title: Great location!
text:
Fantastic hotel in a great location at the top of the Spanish steps!.. Really friendly staff.. Definitely go back .rooms clean, & good size, breakfast good & altogether a charming little hotel.
We love ROMA & staying here made our little break complete!much nicer than staying in a big , China hotel, so much character.
